title: Detective Conan: Shadows of Deceit
premise: In the dark alleys of a crime-ridden city, Detective Conan must unravel the complex web surrounding the brutal murder of a notorious drug dealer. As the layers peel away, the stakes rise, challenging Conan's wit and courage.

shotlist.description: A dark, stormy night in London, rain pounding on the pavement. The city's skyline looms in the background.
shotlist.image_generation_prompt: A stormy night in London, with heavy rain and a dark, brooding skyline in the background, lights reflecting on wet streets.

voice_over.text: In a city veiled by darkness, a sinister plot unfolds.

shotlist.description: Silhouettes of a group of armed men stealthily approaching a suburban house. The tension is palpable.
shotlist.image_generation_prompt: Shadowy figures of men equipped with weapons, moving towards a small, dimly lit house in a quiet suburb.

voice_over.text: A notorious drug dealer, a target in the dead of night.

shotlist.description: Inside the house, Olsi Kuka is asleep in his bed, unaware of the impending danger.
shotlist.image_generation_prompt: Interior of a bedroom, dimly lit by a night lamp, showing a man sleeping peacefully, unaware of the outside threat.

voice_over.text: Unaware of the looming shadow of death.

shotlist.description: A sudden, violent break-in, doors smashed open. The robbers burst into the bedroom.
shotlist.image_generation_prompt: A violent scene with doors being smashed open by armed men storming into a bedroom, creating chaos.

voice_over.text: Violence erupts as greed drives men to madness.

shotlist.description: A fierce struggle ensues in the bedroom, glimpses of a knife and shouts are heard.
shotlist.image_generation_prompt: A chaotic struggle in a bedroom, flashes of a knife, and shadows of men fighting, with fearful expressions.

voice_over.text: A brutal confrontation for ill-gotten gains.

shotlist.description: Aftermath of the robbery; the room is in disarray with signs of a violent struggle.
shotlist.image_generation_prompt: A disheveled bedroom with overturned furniture, broken items, and signs of a struggle, bathed in the eerie light of morning.

voice_over.text: The dawn reveals the grim aftermath of the night's terror.

shotlist.description: Detective Conan arrives at the crime scene, looking somber as he surveys the scene.
shotlist.image_generation_prompt: Detective Conan at a crime scene, wearing his iconic outfit, observing the chaos in a thoughtful pose.

voice_over.text: But the darkest hour is just before the dawn.

shotlist.description: Conan investigates, collecting evidence, his face set in concentration.
shotlist.image_generation_prompt: Close-up of Conan examining clues meticulously, with a focused expression, surrounded by police tape and officers.

voice_over.text: Each clue, a whisper from the shadows.

shotlist.description: Flashback shots of the robbers planning the attack, with a map and photos of the dealer.
shotlist.image_generation_prompt: A dimly lit room with a group of men around a table, looking at a map and photographs, plotting a crime.

voice_over.text: A conspiracy woven with precision and malice.

shotlist.description: Conan in his makeshift lab, analyzing evidence, his face illuminated by the glow of the computer screen.
shotlist.image_generation_prompt: Conan in a small, tech-filled room, deeply focused on analyzing evidence on a computer, tools scattered around.

voice_over.text: Every piece of the puzzle brings him closer to the unseen truth.

shotlist.description: Confrontation scene where Conan faces off with one of the robbers in a tense standoff.
shotlist.image_generation_prompt: Intense scene with Conan standing defiantly against a larger, menacing robber in a dark alley.

voice_over.text: Justice demands courage in the face of darkness.

shotlist.description: A dramatic courtroom scene, defendants looking anxious as the verdict is being read.
shotlist.image_generation_prompt: A solemn courtroom, with defendants including two young men, Santana and Daige, looking tense as a judge reads the verdict.

voice_over.text: The scales of justice tilt, as the truth is unveiled.

shotlist.description: The trailer ends with Conan, his silhouette against the city at night, looking determined.
shotlist.image_generation_prompt: Silhouette of Conan against a backdrop of a nighttime cityscape, looking determined and ready to solve the next mystery.

voice_over.text: In a world veiled by shadows, one detective stands as the beacon of truth.
